title: vaDivaambikEy
sahitya:
vaDivAmbikE! shrI bAlAmbikE! janmam 
kaDaittErum neRi tandaruLvAyammA 
(shrI vaDivAmbikE)

anupallavi

viDai vAhanan Isan iDabAgamena tigazhndu 
aDiyAr tuyar tIrkka karuNai mazhai pozhinda 
(vaDivAmbikE)

caraNam

Odi uNarndiDum uttamar uLmana jOti enat tigazhum deyvam nI anRO! 
nI tanda isai gnAnam adarkkiNai uNDO! 
AdipurIswaranum agamagizhndADiDa

madhyama kAlam

pAda silmaboli tanda layam tanil nALum naTamiDum gowrI! (su...) 
nAdamaya dvijAvanti rAga ezhil kamazhum isai inba sAgarI! 
mEdiniyil undan padam tanaip 
pADi negizhndiDum nenjcam tanil ninRa 
(vaDivAmbikE)
